note.p: Custom house and shipping agent. Offices at 7 East India Chambers, Leadenhall Street, London. Possibly Henry Taylor (b. 1822/3), East India agent living in Tottenham, Middlesex, 1861; agent for shipping living in Edmonton, Middlesex, 1871; shipping agent living in Leyton, Essex, 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/794/30/5), 1871 (RG10/1341/100/43), 1891 (RG12/1345/111/26)
